words.word_translated: bank (NOUN) - a place where money is kept or managed
words.sentence: Het meisje gaat naar de bank.
words.sentence_translated: The girl goes to the bank.

words.sentence: Ze doet controle bij de bank.
words.sentence_translated: She does a check at the bank.

words.sentence: Ze wil bij de bank overnachten.
words.sentence_translated: She wants to stay overnight at the bank.

words.sentence: Het is prima om te overnachten bij de bank.
words.sentence_translated: It's great to stay overnight at the bank.

words.sentence: De natte bank is niet prima voor overnachten.
words.sentence_translated: The wet bank is not great for staying overnight.

words.sentence: Zij miste haar emoties bij de natte bank.
words.sentence_translated: She forgot her emotions at the wet bank.

words.sentence: Hij heeft zijn emoties verteld bij de bank.
words.sentence_translated: He has told his emotions at the bank.

words.sentence: Ze kan haar emoties terughalen bij de natte bank.
words.sentence_translated: She can recall her emotions at the wet bank.
